archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1122
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I would like my self service to be personalised/tailored based on my current services with Vodafone, so that it can be useful for me

properties.value: OOTB basic customization is available based on type of offer (prepaid vs postpaid, mobile vs fixed, with or without a device) Assumption: not in scope for Comarch anymore

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
